W

WAIT - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.view.model.Phase
The WAIT phase is used to wait for the other players to choose their color, and in all phases for RMI
WAIT_ALL_CHOSEN_COLOR - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.view.model.Phase
The WAIT_ALL_CHOSEN_COLOR phase is used to wait for all players to choose their color.
WAIT_ALL_CHOSEN_SECRET_CARD - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.view.model.Phase
The WAIT_ALL_CHOSEN_SECRET_CARD phase is used to wait for all players to choose their secret objective card.
WAIT_ALL_CHOSEN_STARTING_CARD - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.view.model.Phase
The WAIT_ALL_CHOSEN_STARTING_CARD phase is used to wait for all players to choose their starting card.
WAIT_NUMBER_OF_PLAYERS - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.view.model.Phase
The WAIT_NUMBER_OF_PLAYERS phase is used to wait for the first players to choose the number of players in the game or that enough players are connected.
waitLobby() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client.Controller
Triggers the view to display a waiting message to the user.
waitLobby() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GUI
This method is part of the ViewInterface implemented by the GUI class.
waitLobby() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.LoginController
This method is used to handle the scenario where the user has connected to the server and is waiting for the first player to choose the number of players for the game.
waitLobby() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI
Informs the player that they are connected to the server and waiting for the first player to choose the number of players.
waitLobby() - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.view.ViewInterface
This method is responsible for making the user wait in the lobby until the first player have chosen the number of players and enough players have joined the lobby.
WOLF - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Sign
The WOLF sign.
WRONG_PHASE - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.messages.ErrorType
Represents an error when an action is performed in the wrong phase.
wrongGamePhase() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GUI
This method is part of the ViewInterface implemented by the GUI class.
wrongGamePhase() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.MatchController
This method is used in the MatchController class of the GUI.
wrongGamePhase() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI
Informs the player that he can't perform the action in this game phase.
wrongGamePhase() - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.view.ViewInterface
This method is responsible for showing an error message when the player tries to play/draw/set a card in a wrong phase.
WrongGamePhaseException - Exception Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.exception
This exception is thrown when the player tries to perform an action that is not allowed in the current game phase.
WrongGamePhaseException() - Constructor for exception class it.polimi.ingsw.model.exception.WrongGamePhaseException
 
wrongPhase() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client.Controller
Notifies the view that the game is in the wrong phase.
